messages.subject: Yugioh game help
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/30/02 9:17:48 AM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/30/02 9:17:48 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< I heard that the yu gi ho games for the game boy are in Japanese and
subtitled in English, is this true? >>

No, that isn't true.
Here in America, you can buy them in just plain English! I think you would
have to actually try hard to find them in Japanese over here.

Ren
"The answers aren't important really...
What's important, is knowing all the questions."
-Zilpha Keatley Snyder
Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
